document.full_text: shelvin mack scored 27 points saturday as eighth-seeded butler earned a trip back to the final four after upsets of no. 2 florida, no. 1 pittsburgh and no. 4 wisconsin.
document.title: southeast: butler 74, florida 71, ot: overtime victory puts butler back in final four
lines_and_colors: shelvin mack scored 27 points saturday as eighth-seeded butler earned a trip back to the final four after upsets of no. 2 florida, no. 1 pittsburgh and no. 4 wisconsin.
